name: claude-mem-vscode
description: Persistent memory for GitHub Copilot conversations powered by claude-mem

languageModelTools.name: mem_session_init
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Initialize a new claude-mem session for this conversation. This captures the project context and user's initial prompt. Call this once at the start of each conversation.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Initializes memory tracking for this conversation

project.description: The project name (typically workspace folder name)

userPrompt.description: The initial user prompt that started this conversation

languageModelTools.name: mem_user_prompt_log
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Log a user prompt to claude-mem for full-text search. Use this for each user message in the conversation (after session init).

languageModelTools.name: mem_observation_record
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Record a tool usage observation (file edits, terminal commands, etc.) to claude-mem. The AI will compress this into structured knowledge. Call this after significant actions.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Records tool usage for memory building

tool_name.description: The name of the tool that was used

tool_input.description: JSON string of the tool's input parameters

tool_response.description: JSON string of the tool's response/output

languageModelTools.name: mem_summary_finalize
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Generate a summary of the conversation session. This creates a structured summary of what was investigated, learned, and completed. Call this when the conversation is ending or when the user explicitly stops.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Generates session summary for future reference

last_user_message.description: The last message from the user (optional)

languageModelTools.name: mem_session_cleanup
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Mark the memory session as complete and cleanup resources. Call this when the conversation ends or when switching to a new conversation.

claudeMem.workerPort.description: Port for the claude-mem worker service

claudeMem.autoInit.description: Automatically initialize memory session for new conversations

claudeMem.autoCapture.description: Automatically capture tool usage as observations

claudeMem.maxObservationsPerPrompt.description: Maximum observations to capture per user prompt

claudeMem.showStatusBar.description: Show worker health status in status bar

author: thedotmack
